title: Memorializing Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to proclaim Monday, March 7, 2011, as Save My Spine Day in the State of New York
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE   RESOLUTION  memorializing  Governor  Andrew  M.  Cuomo  to
proclaim Monday, March 7, 2011, as Save My Spine Day in the State of New
York

WHEREAS, This Legislative Body takes great pride in applauding organiza-
tions whose diligence and compassionate commitment help to  improve  the
quality  of  life  of others, often recognizing events of such organiza-
tions designed to increase awareness of health issues which  affect  the
lives of many New Yorkers; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  memorial-
ize  Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to proclaim Monday, March 7, 2011, as Save
My Spine Day in the State of New York; and
  WHEREAS, Physical Therapists throughout the State of New York  observe
Save  My  Spine  Day  as  a special opportunity to advance awareness and
knowledge about spinal health and wellness to  their  patients  and  the
youth and adults in their communities; and
  WHEREAS,  Save  My Spine Day encourages Physical Therapists to promote
and present the current evidence based interventions for proper posture,
exercises and ergonomics to businesses, health  and  education  systems,
and health policymakers in their community; and
  WHEREAS,  Physical  Therapists  continue to support and encourage such
behaviors which will attempt to decrease the  incidence  of  back  pain,
injury,  and  related  surgeries,  in an attempt to reduce the burden of
these healthcare costs; and
  WHEREAS, Physical Therapists  assemble  practical  resources  for  the
public  and  furthermore encourage the development of outreach programs;
and
  WHEREAS, The observance of Save My Spine Day is to alert all New York-
ers about the serious impact of spinal  disability  on  individuals  and
health care systems and to promote better spinal health habits; and
  WHEREAS, Save My Spine Day supports its mission to educate communities
and  patients  about  the  spine's  central  and  vital role in peoples'
health; and
  WHEREAS, It is in the interest of the State of New York  to  recognize
the  achievements  made  and  to continue these efforts by promoting and
educating the public on the importance of maintaining healthy backs  and
spines; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body  pause in it deliberations to
memorialize Governor Andrew M. Cuomo to proclaim Monday, March 7,  2011,
as Save My Spine Day in the State of New York; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  The Honorable Andrew M. Cuomo, Governor of the State of New
York.
